text: John Ratcliffe (c. 1536 – 1590) of Ordsall, Lancashire, England, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Wigan in 1563 and for Lancashire in 1571 and 1572. ==References== Category:1536 births Category:1590 deaths Category:Members of the Parliament of England (pre-1707) for Lancashire Category:English MPs 1563–1567 Category:English MPs 1571 Category:English MPs 1572–1583
title: John Ratcliffe (16th-century MP)
